TopicTitle: Ask a stupid question, Get a stupid answer back.

Articles.Content:
We would be doing the being deeds.

How to distinguish Sadlark from Iocounu?

Different spelling

Is this thread still KSP related?

Always, never.

Was it ever?

No.

What are we talking about again?

Life the universe and everything.

42?

That is the answer to life, the universe, and everything, but we will never be able to know what the question was.

How many mods is considered too much for KSP?

Every new moderator is appreciated.

 

20 hours ago, tryharder said:

Is this thread still KSP related?

Everything around is KSP-related to some extent.

 

Were there people in the Apollos which were on the Moon?

No, there were no Apollos on the Moon. There were

Armstrong

Aldrin

Conrad

Bean

Shepard

Mitchell

Scott

Irwin

Young

Duke

Cernan

Schmitt

 

How do you get a Moon shadow?

You have just to stand in front of the window. Then everybody behind you wil see a moonlight shadow falling on him.

Why spend so much aluminium on the space rockets?

Because working completely reusable rockets do not exist yet, and therefore the aluminum stays in space.

How do I make my KSP instance stable without removing any mods?

Use it as a screensaver.

I can't get no, satisfaction. Any ideas on how I might?

Attempt a Jool V.

How do i ward off Ghost Leviathan attacks?

Be a ghost, then they will pass right through you.

How to spin out?

Be a meson of two co-spinned quarks.

As "murder" is action, and the actor is "murderer", then as cauldron is "boiler", is the cook "boilerer"?

Edited July 11 by kerbiloid

No. The cauldron is boiled by the boiler.

There is a body of water and a headland. Where is the heart?

Hopefully thrown in the sea.

Why do maps make everything look small?

To save RAM.
 

6 hours ago, ColdJ said:

There is a body of water and a headland. Where is the heart?

Quote

My heart’s in the Highlands wherever I go.


How much RAM do you need to let KSP-2 work properly?

It doesn’t matter, a computer that meets all of the minimum system requirements and most of the recommended ones will still run the game poorly.

Could you make a Starship Heavy by strapping additional super heavy boosters to the sides of the central booster in the same way that Falcon Heavy does?

Strapping anything heavy to something will make it heavy.

If you see a duck and then someone yells duck, do you duck or do you say "Captain Obvious"?

I duck and cover.

If overturn SuperHeavy, will it have negative mass?

No, and it will not get FAA launch approval either.

What is the criteria for if a question is stupid enough to post in this thread or not?

All questions, no matter how sensible they are, will be considered stupid for the purposes of this thread. (much like trying to ask for help in any forum and getting the trolls that respond first by asking why you bothered asking, rather than answer your question.)

If a tree falls on a tropical island, will there be coconuts?

Yes, if a coconut vendor is standing below.

Why did the Mayne Reid's characters have a duel inside a saloon, driving other customers outside, when all westerns show that vice versa, the gunslingers and the viewers get out of the saloon?

It was a really cold day, or they had seen the movie "Shane" and valued a wall at their back.

If a Coconut Vendor falls on a tropical island, will there be palm trees?

There will be his palms everywhere, after his attempts to stand up.

Do they call the restaurant clowns "stand-up" for their ability of quickly standing up after being beaten for bad jokes?
